testcase.name: Upskill SignUp Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is at the Upsill SignUp page.....................................passed When User enters FirstName with Shravya.....................................passed And User enters LastName with Rai...........................................passed And User enters Email with shravya@mail.com.................................passed And User enters Username....................................................passed And User enters Password with Shravya.......................................passed And User confirms Password with Shravya.....................................passed And User enters Phone with 9876543211.......................................passed And User clicks Register button.............................................passed And User Validates Message with Dear Shravya,Rai............................passed And User Validates Email with shravya@mail.com..............................passed Then User is at mail page...................................................passed Then User clicks Compose Mail...............................................passed And User enters Send to field with virat....................................passed And User enters Subject with Mail To Test...................................passed And User enters Message Body with Hi, Mail To Test..........................passed And User send the mail......................................................passed And User Validates the sent message.........................................passed
